stimulusHtml: For a rational consumer with diminishing marginal utility, the consumption of an additional unit of a good will result in which of the following?
choicesHtml: Total utility will increase until it equals marginal utility.
Total utility will increase while marginal utility will be negative.
Total utility will increase while marginal utility will decrease.
Total utility will decrease while marginal utility will be positive.
Total utility will decrease while marginal utility will increase.
